trans-unit.source: Timer accepts the following arguments when it's created, all are optional:
trans-unit.target: Timer 在创建时接受以下参数，所有参数都是可选的：

trans-unit.source: codetiming - A flexible, customizable timer for your Python code
trans-unit.target: codetiming -一个灵活的，可自定义的Python计时器

trans-unit.source: codetiming is based on a similar module originally developed for the Midgard Geodesy library at the Norwegian Mapping Authority.
trans-unit.target: codetiming 是基于最初是为开发了类似的模块上尘世大地测量学库在挪威测绘局。

trans-unit.source: timers support .count(), .total(), .min(), .max(), .mean(), .median(), and .stdev().
trans-unit.target: timers 支持 .count() 。 .total() ， .min() ， .max() ， .mean() ， .median() ，和 .stdev() 。

trans-unit.source: logger: A function/callable that takes a string argument, and will report the elapsed time when the logger is stopped (default: print())
trans-unit.target: logger ：带有字符串参数的函数/可调用函数，它将报告记录器停止时的经过时间（默认值： print() ）

trans-unit.source: name: An optional name for your timer
trans-unit.target: name ：计时器的可选名称

trans-unit.source: text: The text shown when your timer ends. It should contain a {} placeholder that will be filled by the elapsed time in seconds (default: "Elapsed time: {:.4f} seconds")
trans-unit.target: text ：计时器结束时显示的文字。它应该包含一个 {} 占位符，该占位符将以经过的时间（以秒为单位）填充（默认值： "Elapsed time: {:.4f} seconds" ）

trans-unit.source: A flexible, customizable timer for your Python code
trans-unit.target: 为你的Python代码提供一个灵活的、可定制的定时器。

trans-unit.source: Acknowledgements
trans-unit.target: 鸣谢

trans-unit.source: Basic Usage
trans-unit.target: 基本使用方法

trans-unit.source: Capturing the Elapsed Time
trans-unit.target: 捕捉耗时

trans-unit.source: For a complete tutorial on how codetiming works, see Python Timer Functions: Three Ways to Monitor Your Code on Real Python.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何一个完整的教程 codetiming 作品，请参阅Python的计时器功能：三种方法来监测你的代码在实际的Python。

trans-unit.source: In the template text, you can also use explicit attributes to refer to the name of the timer, or log the elapsed time in milliseconds, seconds (the default), or minutes. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在模板文本中，您还可以使用显式属性来引用计时器的 name ，或以 milliseconds ， seconds （默认值）或 minutes 为单位记录经过的时间。例如：

trans-unit.source: Install codetiming from PyPI:
trans-unit.target: 从PyPI 安装 codetiming ：

trans-unit.source: Named Timers
trans-unit.target: 已命名的定时器

trans-unit.source: Named timers are made available in the class dictionary Timer.timers. The elapsed time will accumulate if the same name or same timer is used several times. Consider the following example:
trans-unit.target: 在类字典 Timer.timers 中可以使用命名计时器。如果多次使用相同的名称或相同的计时器，经过的时间将累积。考虑以下示例：

trans-unit.source: Note that the strings used by text are not f-strings. Instead they are used as templates that will be populated using .format() behind the scenes. If you want to combine the text template with an f-string, you need to use double braces for the template values:
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是所使用的字符串 text 是不是 F-字符串。相反，它们用作模板，将在后台使用 .format() 进行填充。如果要将 text 模板与f字符串结合使用，则需要对模板值使用大括号：

trans-unit.source: The example shows how you can redirect the timer output to the logging module. Note that the elapsed time spent in the two different uses of t has been accumulated in Timer.timers.
trans-unit.target: 该示例说明如何将计时器输出重定向到日志记录模块。请注意，在 t 的两种不同用法中花费的经过时间已累积在 Timer.timers 中。

trans-unit.source: The source code is available at GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 源代码可从GitHub获得。

trans-unit.source: When using Timer as a class, you can capture the elapsed time when calling .stop():
trans-unit.target: 将 Timer 用作类时，可以在调用 .stop() 时捕获经过的时间：

trans-unit.source: You can also find the last measured elapsed time in the .last attribute. The following code will have the same effect as the previous example:
trans-unit.target: 您还可以在 .last 属性中找到上次测量的经过时间。以下代码与上一个示例具有相同的效果：

trans-unit.source: You can also get simple statistics about your named timers. Continuing from the example above:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以得到关于你的命名定时器的简单统计。继续上面的例子。

trans-unit.source: You can turn off explicit reporting of the elapsed time by setting logger=None.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过设置 logger=None 关闭显式的经过时间报告。

trans-unit.source: You can use codetiming.Timer in several different ways:
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过几种不同的方式使用 codetiming.Timer ：
